#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T, N;
	int temp, ans;
	
	cin >> T;
	
	while(T--)
	{
		//cin >> N;
		scanf("%d", &N);
		
		temp = 1;
		while(2*temp <= N)
		{
			temp *= 2;
		}
		ans = (N-temp)*2+1;
		//cout << ans << endl;
		printf("%d\n", ans);
	}

	return 0;
}
